text: Bibeau is a surname of French origin. Notable people with the surname include: *Antoine Bibeau (born 1994), Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender *Marie Bibeau (1865–1924), first Superior General of the Little Franciscans of Mary *Marie-Claude Bibeau, Canadian politician *Michael Zehaf-Bibeau (1982–2014) (aka Joseph Paul Michael Bibeau), the perpetrator of the 2014 shootings at Parliament Hill, Ottawa *Ray Bibeau, Canadian ice hockey player *Rénald Bibeau, Canadian politician
title: Bibeau
